name: @lillallol/merge-pdf
description: High level API that uses pdf-lib to merge pdf. Does not use code from other programming languages.

scripts.validate-package: rm -rf ./dist && npm run spell-check && npm run lint && npm run test && npm run build
scripts.commit-and-push: git add --all && git commit && git push origin master
scripts.pre-bump: npm run validate-package && npm run commit-and-push
scripts.first-publish: npm run pre-bump && npm publish --access public && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-patch: npm run pre-bump && npm version patch && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-minor: npm run pre-bump && npm version minor && npm publish && npm run after-bump
scripts.bump-major: npm run pre-bump && npm version major && npm publish && npm run after-bump

author: lillallol
